decisions.name: Does_the_advice_need_to_be_updated
decisions.label: Does the advice need to be updated?

decisions.label: Does this policy need to be placed in trust?

decisions.name: What_type_of_recommendation_is_this_for
decisions.label: What type of recommendation is this for?

Flow.description: Flow to create new process fulfilment when recommendations are accepted

formulas.name: portalDisplayType
formulas.expression: IF( {!$Record.ProductName__c}="SIPP" || {!$Record.ProductName__c}="Junior SIPP", "Defined Contribution", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="FIB", "Family Income Benefit", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="SINGLE_LIFE_COVER", "Life Cover", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="INCOME_PROTECTION", "Income Protection", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="RELEVANT_LIFE", "Relevant Life Cover", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="LIFE_CIC", "Life & Critical Illness Cover", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="VCT", "Venture Capital Trust (VCT)", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.ReferenceName__c}="EIS", "Enterprise Investment Scheme (EIS)", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.Name}="ISA Aim Inheritance Tax Service (AITS)", "Inheritance Tax Investment Service ISA", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.Name}="Non-ISA Aim Inheritance Tax Service (AITS)", "Inheritance Tax Investment Service", IF({!$Record.Product__r.ProductType__r.Name}="Octopus Inheritance Tax Service (OITS)", "Inheritance Tax Investment Service", {!$Record.ProductName__c})))))))))))

formulas.description: Text for posting to protection review recommendations
formulas.name: protectionLink
formulas.expression: "The advice to fulfil this recommendation can be found here: https://octopuswealth.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Advice__c/" + {!Create_protection_advice.advice.Id} + "/view"

Flow.label: Recommendation | accepted
